1)  Use and show R code to evaluate the following expression:[ln(120)]^3 -  Ï€
```{r}
desired_value <- (abs(log(120))^3) - pi
print(desired_value)
```

2)  Use and show R code to round your answer from number 1 to the nearest hundredth.
```{r}
print(round(desired_value, digits = 2))
```
3)  Use and show R code to produce all even integers greater than 7 but less than 101.
```{r}
c <- vector()
for (variable in 8:100) {
  if (variable %% 2 == 0) {
    c <- append(c, variable)
  }
}

print(c)
```
4)  Use and show R code to find the mean of all positive integers less than 100.
```{r}
another_c <- vector()
for (i in 0:99) {
  another_c <- append(another_c, i)
}

print(mean(another_c))
```

